title: Border, 1835–60
medium: Block-printed and flocked on machine made paper
description:
Molded bead edgings bracket a wide central design of rococo cartouches with plain diamond diaper centers connected by chains which have a quatrefoil as their center link. Printed in brick-red flocking, grays, white and greens over a pink base coat.

H# 188

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1835–60.
1835–60. Block-printed and flocked on machine made paper. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1972-42-92-a/c.
